movie.title: King Charles
movie.description_intro: An un-ethical DEA agent does everything in his power within and outside the law to catch a cocaine kingpin.
movie.description_full: An un-ethical DEA agent does everything in his power within and outside the law to catch a cocaine kingpin.

movies.title: Medal of Victory
movies.summary: After accidentally shipping a crate of nuclear fusion triggers to Malawi, soldiers Floyd and Stu go AWOL. Back in his old home town, Floyd is mistaken as a war hero and swept up in the local mayoral election. A comically absurd chain of events forces Floyd to decide whether to keep running or face his past and go home again.
movies.description_full: After accidentally shipping a crate of nuclear fusion triggers to Malawi, soldiers Floyd and Stu go AWOL. Back in his old home town, Floyd is mistaken as a war hero and swept up in the local mayoral election. A comically absurd chain of events forces Floyd to decide whether to keep running or face his past and go home again.

A comically absurd chain of events forces Floyd to decide whether to keep running or face his past and go home again.

movies.title: Willard
movies.summary: A social misfit, Willard is made fun of by his co-workers, and squeezed out of the company started by his deceased father by his boss. His only friends are a couple of rats he raised at home, Ben and Socrates. (And their increasing number of friends) However, when one of them is killed at work, he goes on a rampage using his rats to attack those who have been tormenting him.

movies.title: Lethal Panther
movies.summary: In a war for gang supremacy, two beautiful female assassins are given the ultimate target - each other.
movies.description_full: In a war for gang supremacy, two beautiful female assassins are given the ultimate target - each other.
movies.synopsis: In a war for gang supremacy, two beautiful female assassins are given the ultimate target - each other.

movies.title: Urgency
movies.summary: Tony is in a race against time to save his kidnapped wife before she is murdered but as he unravels the mystery behind her abduction he discovers they are after more than money.
